tool_description: Analyzes instrument drift over time during calibration process and assesses long-term stability characteristics for dimensional measuring instruments.

measurement_timestamps.description: Timestamps for each measurement in ISO 8601 format

measurement_values.description: Measurement values corresponding to timestamps in micrometers

error_messages: Array length mismatch: measurement_timestamps and measurement_values must have equal length.
Invalid timestamp format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for all timestamps.
Insufficient data points: Need at least 10 time-stamped measurements for drift analysis.
Analysis window too small: Window must be at least 0.5 hours for meaningful analysis.
usage: Provide time-stamped measurement data from calibration process. Tool analyzes temporal drift patterns and stability characteristics over specified time window.

drift_rate.description: Calculated drift rate in micrometers per hour

correlation_coefficient.description: Correlation between time and measurement drift
